Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions

Enum ActionType

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<ActionType>
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.ActionType
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ActionType>, java.lang.constant.Constable
public enum ActionType
extends java.lang.Enum<ActionType>
ActionType enum Class contains definitions for every possible Action coming from a Client to the Server.
